verses.verse: Do we begin <WG756> again <WG3825> to commend <WG4921> ourselves <WG1438>? or <WG1487> <WG99999> need we <WG5535>, as <WG5613> some <WG5100> others <WG1992>, letters of commendation <WG4956> to <WG4314> you <WG5209>, or <WG2228> letters of <WG1537> commendation <WG4956> from you <WG5216>?
